basics.name: Reid Lum
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2023.

volunteer.organization: Eta Kappa Nu Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
volunteer.summary: Pledge for the international honor society for electrical and computer engineers.

awards.title: Manoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarship is an automatic $2,000-$4,000 scholarship per year for four years of undergraduate study for first-time degree-seeking students. Students must have a 3.8 GPA upon the time of application to UH Manoa.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Undergraduate students are awarded the Deanâ€™s List distinction if they: (1) earn a semester grade point average of 3.5 or higher based on 12 credits or more taken for a grade (C/NC courses do not count), and (2) do not receive grades of W, I, F, or NC for that semester.

awards.title: Hawaii B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
